page.description: Fires when the control is given focus.

description.p: An object that contains properties and methods for inspecting and manipulating the browser event. This object can be referenced in JavaScript added to the event, either through Action Javascript or using *[ui:Text Mode]*.

discussion.p: The *[ui:onFocus]* event is triggered when the user gives focus to a control. Focus is typically given to a control when the user clicks on it.

page.note: Some controls do not support the onBlur event.
